## Data from Yahoo Finance
```{r warning=FALSE}
library(quantmod)
```
```{r warning=FALSE}
stock_list <- c("SPY", "QQQ")
getSymbols(stock_list, from = '2021-01-01', src = "yahoo")

```

## Boxplot monthly - SPY
```{r}
stock <- SPY$SPY.Close
stock %>% ggplot(aes(x = time(stock), y = SPY.Close, group = month(stock))) +
  geom_boxplot() 
  
```

## Boxplot monthly - QQQ
```{r}
stock <- QQQ$QQQ.Close
stock %>% ggplot(aes(x = time(stock), y = QQQ.Close, group = month(stock))) +
  geom_boxplot()

```
